ChargingRateUnitEnumType.description: Can be used to force a power or current profile.

CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

duration.description: Length of the requested schedule in seconds.

evseId.description: The ID of the EVSE for which the schedule is requested. When evseid=0, the Charging Station will calculate the expected consumption for the grid connection.
